thread.title: Liropeya Robbins

author: Liropeya Robbins
title: Liropeya Robbins
text: Zack was awesome and being a gamer himself he completely understood my needs. He was patient and personable even with my 1 year old running in the background. I have heard some pretty terrible things about Verizon but I can honestly say this was one of the easiest and BEST customer service experiences EVER! Cheers to this new relationship!
